ComicInfo.Summary: A rescue operation goes horribly wrong, and it's up to Commander Adam Archer to save the day! What is the dark secret hidden deep in Discordia's past? And will repressed family strife tear the Archer family apart? Cosmic realization meets emocore characterization! Don't miss it!

ComicInfo.Title: The Torture Never Stops
